data.title: Sky Italia - CERN Alumni Virtual Company Showroom
data.meta_description:
The event starts at 11:00 CET

 

CERN Alumni Virtual Company Showroom with Sky Italia

Mark your calendars for January 26th at 11:00 CET as we present a new CERN Alumni Virtual Company Showroom, featuring Sky Italia!

Join representatives from Sky Italia to find out more about the company, potential job opportunities and the skills and talents they are now seeking.

The event will start at 11:00 CET with a general presentation and will be followed by a Q&A session, come equipped with your questions.

Please register for the event to receive the zoom link.

 

About Sky Italia

 

Sky Italia is a media & entertainment company established in 2003. It's part of the Sky group, one of the leading entertainment groups in Europe, controlled by Comcast Corporation, an international media & technology company. Sky has changed the viewing habits of millions of Italians and is synonymous with innovation. 

The latest innovation is Sky Glass, a next-generation smart TV that integrates Sky's content, free-to-air channels, and streaming services into a single interface. The range of products and services is completed with Sky Q, which combines Sky content with that of major apps, 
and NOW, the OTT offering that provides access to Sky-branded content. Additionally, Sky offers the ultrabroadband service Sky Wifi, considered Italy's fastest fixed network according to Oookla®. 

Apart from sports, movies, news, entertainment, cinema, and culture content, Sky is also a producer of some of Italy's most successful original TV series, and its production commitment continues to grow. Through TV channels TV8, Cielo, and Sky Tg24, Sky is also 
available free-to-air on digital terrestrial television. 

The company promotes responsible business, environmental protection, and the fight against digital inequality. With the Sky Zero campaign, it has committed to becoming net zero carbon by 2030.

 

Sky Italia Speakers

 



Eleonora Khalidy

HR Recruitment
 



Tommaso Bontae

Senior Specialist - Data Science

 


Please take note of the CERN Alumni Data Privacy Notice for Events
